channel.title: Friends on Shelter's House
channel.description: Recent content in Friends on Shelter's House

item.title: Fitness & Friends
item.description: Friday night we went out for Thai! As usual, Zac ordered the better dish. Mine was a little (way) too spicy for my likes, so I helped Z out a bit. It was good, but we’ll still be on the hunt for Denvers best Thai! Saturday night we went out for a few drinks. We wanted to stay close, since Zac was still recovering. We headed to Zengo, but they had a huge Year of the Rooster celebration going on, and we weren’t able to get in the door!
